price: Akamfunulia mja wake (Mwenyezi Mungu) alicho mfunulia.
footnotes: Jibrili akamfunulia mja wa Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake, alicho mfunulia, nao ufunuo huo ni jambo lenye shani kubwa na athari ya mbali kabisa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
